item.description:
Welcome to the Providence Collective Monday Meetup series!

This event is open to all, especially those who hate Mondays and especially for those who want to check out the different restaurant/bar scenes in Providence.

This week's location is: Ardeo - next to Waterplace Park (next to the Capital Grille and diagonal from Lux Burger)

Ardeo is the newest edition to the Waterplace Park restaurant scene and specializes in Mediterranean cuisine (and yes, this is where Raphael's "used to be" - *sniff*). The newest restaurant in a small chain that has several popular locations on the Cape, THIS location is decidedly more upscale and elegant befitting the Providence nightlife. Oddly, I have actually been in the one in Yarmouth - so you can only imagine my suprise at realizing the connection to the one in Providence - they've done a great job! The restaurant is also located next to the tunnel that connects to the skating rink so its a great place for an apr√®s-skate drink or bite to eat. It's a versatile place that becomes a nightclub after the weekend dinner crowd leaves and I've heard the food is great to boot! It's one to know about, so let's check it out!

Hope to see you there!

Come early, come late, leave early, stay late, everyone is always welcome...

Nothing ever cancels Monday Happy Hours.
Ever.
